text: Novokhalilovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Mesyagutovsky Selsoviet Duvansky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 156 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 8 km from Mesyagutovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Duvansky District
title: Novokhalilovo
